82264194.title: Killing of Monique and Spencer Tepe
82264194.extract: On December 30, 2025, Monique Tepe, 39, and her husband, Spencer Tepe, 37, were found shot dead inside their home in Columbus, Ohio, after Spencer failed to arrive for work and a welfare check was requested. Their two young children and family dog were discovered unharmed. The investigation soon focused on Monique's ex‑husband, Michael David McKee, 39, who was arrested in Illinois on January 10, 2026, and later indicted in Franklin County on four counts of aggravated murder and one count of aggravated burglary. The criminal proceedings remain ongoing.
